thread.section_title: Hotel Torino - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Normal hotel but not 4*
thread.title_full: Normal hotel but not 4* - Review of Hotel Torino, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Elene A
title: Normal hotel but not 4*
text: Hotel is comfortable, location is great, interior is old but rooms are clean, big tv, big window, bathroom is huge, only I couldn't take a shower at night, because hot water didn't come(warm one, but not enough warm for a cold day) Had to take shower in the morning Normal breakfast they do have a nice veranda with cool views stuff is polite and speaks engish
